t: Crea e accelera la tua attività su Amazon IT
s: The Amazon Accelerate programme is a free educational programme for anyone looking to start a new online business or accelerate an existing one. Amazon Accelerate goes beyond selling on Amazon and covers a number of key topics to help your business succeed in e-commerce.

s: December 1, 2020 - Il colosso dell’eCommerce ha annunciato a fine novembre che avrebbe presto lanciato in Italia un servizio chiamato “Accelera con Amazon”. Il programma mira ad aiutare le PMI a sviluppare le proprie capacità di vendita online.

t: Amazon IP Accelerator: Trademark support for your brand

t: Anyone have recent experience with Amazon Accelerator programme?
s: The only way that they have any right to acquire a brand from someone else, is if you give them the right. It certainly can’t be forced. And if it is actually correct, there is no way in hell, I would give up that right and would strongly advise that you don’t. If this program works well and you quadruple your sales due to it, they are just going to step in, give you a fiver and walk away with your work… ...
